storage_safety: Keep primer tightly sealed and upright to prevent leakage or spillage.
Store in a cool, dry, and frost-free place.
Ensure good ventilation when applying. Do not breathe vapor or spray mist.
Protect from direct sunlight and heat.
Wear gloves, goggles, and mask during handling and application.
Clean tools and hands with soap and water after use.
Do not discharge into drains or environment.
